title: University

title: General Electric Internship
description: Tech stack:
- Full-stack international business toolset: PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, jQuery, XML, Python
- Debugging, performance improvements, and maintainable code with long-term impact in mind
Agile & SDLC:
- Scrum-style cadence with backlog grooming, iterative delivery, and peer reviews
- Full SDLC flow with verification and validation before sign-off
Collaboration:
- Partnered with on-site and global teams to unblock dependencies and deliver to end-user standards on time

title: Barclaycard
description: Joining Barclaycard (Graduate Programme, 2018):
- Joined the graduate programme after an interview experience that genuinely clicked; the people, culture, and ambitious tech roadmap felt like the right home
- I was excited to finish uni and start contributing to real products with real impact from day one
Junior Software Engineer (Jul 2018 - Apr 2020):
- Role summary: Joined the PaaS team building the internal platform that powers Barclaycard Payment Solutions
- Platform/tech: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, IAM, SSM, KMS, CloudWatch, SNS, VPC, Transit Gateway, Direct Connect), Terraform, Chef, Packer, Ruby, Jenkins, OpenShift, Windows Server 2016, RHEL
- Delivery: CI/CD automation, Java app deployments, PCI-compliant infrastructure, troubleshooting and support
Software Engineer (Apr 2020 - Oct 2020):
- Role summary: Increased ownership of deliverables, coached others, and led more complex changes
- Delivery: Reliability improvements and platform enhancements with a focus on long-term stability
Scrum Master / DevOps Engineer (Oct 2020 - Apr 2022):
- Role summary: Split role by choice to lean into the people side of delivery while staying hands-on
- Agile/leadership: Scrum/Kanban ceremonies, impediment removal, stakeholder alignment, backlog prioritisation
- Coaching: Onboarded and mentored offshore teams through pairing and guided learning
Scrum Master (Apr 2022 - Mar 2024):
- Role summary: Went full-time SM to drive broader impact across teams and a more challenging environment
- Outcomes: 80%+ predictability, 33% backlog waste reduction, delivery maturity uplift across two cross-functional teams
- Leadership: Psychological safety focus, SM community learning groups, coaching new SMs; Jira/Confluence power-user
